name.ja: スネークアイ<ruby>追<rt>つい</rt></ruby><ruby>走<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>劇<rt>げき</rt></ruby>

text.en: Place 1 "Diabellstar" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY face-up in its owner's Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell. During the End Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Monster Card treated as a Continuous Spell you control; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Snake-Eye Dramatic Chase" once per turn.
